response.answer_text: Gerald Ford. He was smart enough to recognize the impact of impeachment on the country. Something that the current group of clowns could take into consideration so that do not get remembered for their ignorance.
Best Your Choice: Teddy RooseveltHarry S. TrumanWorst VPs …Your choice: Richard NixonSpiro Agnew
